sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react'
import {BrowserRouter, Routes, Route, Navigate} from 'react-router-dom'
import { AuthContextProvider} from './contexts/AuthContext'
import Signup from './pages/Signup'
import Login from './pages/Login'
import Navbar from './components/Navbar'
import Home from './components/Home'
import Publish from './pages/Publish'
import Blog from './pages/Blog'
import './App.css'
const App = () => {
  return (
    <>
      <AuthContextProvider>
        <BrowserRouter>
          <Navbar/>
          <Routes>
            <Route exact path="/" element={<Home/>} />
            <Route path="/signup" element={<Signup/>} />
            <Route path="/login" element={AuthContextProvider.authState? <Home/> : <Navigate to="/login"/>} />
            <Route path="/write" element={AuthContextProvider.authState? <Publish/> : <Navigate to="/login"/>} />
            <Route path="/read/:blogId" element={AuthContextProvider.authState? <Blog/> : <Navigate to="/login"/>}/>
          </Routes>
        </BrowserRouter>
      </AuthContextProvider>
    </>
  )
}

export default App
